name: Motherchak Naboday Kishalay Sangha
briefDescription: We are not change agent, neither we are practitioner of salvation. We are just facilitator of development for the people, by the  people and of the people, we have started journey in the year of 1985 with a deal to promote the livelihood of ethnic tribals, dalits and scheduled cast, the women and the children. We, initial years struggled for our survival with peoples contributions and participations. In gradual context, we could set some foot mark in the endeavour of life enrichment for Dalits. We set up our goal, tapped local, govt. and non-govt. resources to find the means of enlightening peoples’ lives. MNKS now lives in the peoples’ heart and some of the salient activities are so explained underneath
